text:
Kalakkad police have arrested three persons in connection with the murder of a youth on Monday night.

Police said S. Pasupathi (25) of Keezha Sadaiyamaankulam under Kalakkad police station limits in the district was hacked to death by unidentified persons when he was in his farm on Monday evening. As he failed to return home in the night, his parents started searching for him and finally found his body in the ranch.

During investigation, police found that Appadurai (53) of the same area, who had enmity with Pasupathi, had murdered him and arrested Appadurai, his brothers Deepak (35) and Jayakumar (38) in connection with the murder.
title: Three held for youth’s murder
